content: Yes, the Orlando Magic won the Eastern Conference Championship in 1995 and 2009, but they have never won an NBA championship. The team reached the NBA Finals in 1995, but lost to the Houston Rockets in four games. In 2009, they reached the NBA Finals again, but lost to the Los Angeles Lakers in five games. The team has made several playoff appearances over the years and has had many notable players, but they have yet to win an NBA championship.
